data.description: easy to use form creation and processing
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is intended as a light-weight, east-to-use alternative to the
    commonly used CGI.pm. It doesn't do half of what that module does,
    but what it does do is provide just the functions needed for drawing
    and processing forms, which makes it light-weight compared to
    CGI.pm. It also provides for reasonable defaults for many field
    attributes, meaning less typing. And it also (optionally) draws your
    form in a nice table format, making for a more readable layout.
